question: Recently, eBay India has been merged into __________.
explanation: E-commerce major Flipkart has completed the merger with eBay India's operations. The deal was announced in April when the Flipkart group raised $ 1.4 billion from global technology majors eBay, Tencent and Microsoft. In exchange of an equity stake in Flipkart, eBay had made a cash investment of $ 500 million and sold its eBay.in business to Flipkart.
